updates.text: 24/03, 8.04pm: NEL full service has resumed. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL train service has resumed. However pls expect a delay of about 10 mins to travel time. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
24/03, 7.34pm: NEL train service has resumed. However pls expect a delay of about 10 mins to travel time.
24/03, 7.15pm: NEL svc is delayed due to a train fault at Kovan stn NE13 twds Punggol. Additional travelling time of 15 mins is expected.
24/03, 8.50am: NEL svc has resumed at Harbourfront NE1. All train services has resumed.
24/03, 8.44am: NEL svc is delayed due to a Signaling fault at Harbourfront NE1. Additional travel time of abt 10 minutes may be expected.
24/03, 8.31am: NEL svc is delayed due to a Signaling fault at Harbourfront NE1. Additional travel time of abt 15 minutes may be expected.
